name: WebMynd Corp.
description: Developer of a mobile application creating tool platform designed to assist companies to interact with their customer through digital media. The company's platform develops HTML5 operating system and regularly updates bugs which make the application low data consuming, enabling web developers to build a native mobile application at web speed.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application creating tool platform designed to assist companies to interact with their customer through digital media. The company's platform develops HTML5 operating system and regularly updates bugs which make the application low data consuming, enabling web developers to build a native mobile application at web speed.
